generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone surface with visible tram tracks and road markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb and featuring bicycles and pedestrians, is visible.
- building: A large stone building with arched windows and doorways dominates the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings in the upper right.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk near the bicycles on the left side of the image.
- car: A red car is parked on the left side of the road, and a black car is driving on the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating a bicycle lane is visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: A pole with a traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, showing a red light.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
